On Sep 22, 2012, at 10:41 AM, Steve Klabnik wrote:

> "Cool URIs don't cha=
nge" is not a RESTful principle.

I said "best practice", not "principle".

And IMHO, striving for keeping URIs stable is a key ingredient of making R=
ESTful systems work despite their inherent non-coupling.

Jan
